mapper.select: select (select hour(TIMEDIFF(current_timestamp, post_date))) as post_timepassed, post.* from post order by post_view desc, post_date desc
select * from post join member on post_member_num = member_num where post_num = #{post_num}
select * from post join member on post_member_num = member_num where post_num = #{post_num}
mapper.update: update post set post_view = post_view + 1 where post_num = #{post_num}
mapper.insert: insert into report(report_member_num, report_post_num, report_category_num, report_content) values(#{member_num}, #{report.report_post_num}, #{report.report_category_num}, #{report.report_content})
mapper.update: update post set post_report = post_report + 1 where post_num = #{report_post_num}
